data.system_settings: iPhone 6s, iOS 11.3 & iPad Air 2, iOS 11.4 PB 1
data.actual_result: You will always see the same avatar/icon (the Discord logo) for the users and user with now own avatar/icon.
data.expected_result: The correct server icon und user avatar should be shown for the share extension
data.short_description: Share extension: Wrong default server icon and user avatar shown
data.steps_to_repro: - Open any iOS app (e.g. the Photos app) that has the ability to share something with other apps - Select something (e.g. a photo) - Click on the share button and choose Discord - Tap on `Share in` and search for a server that has no own icon but the default one - Also select Direct Messages, tap on `Share to` and search for users with default avatars
